-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                       Description
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Travelling faster than a speeding bullet and burning five times hotter than 
the surface of the sun, lightning can strike humans dead and unexpectedly. 
Explore the science behind the deadly and mysterious occurrence in Human 
Voltage: Struck By Lightning. The film follows the stories of three lightning 
victims - one a recent victim and two others plagued with unusual long term 
consequences.
